page.title: 11NOTABLE EVENTS
page.content: One of the most important things that has happened in this area has been the argument in Rhosesmor between the residents and a factory owner. The factory is Tiger Tim which makes fire lighters - this is a material which you put amoung the coal and wood in a grate; it helps to get the fire going. There was a factory belonging to Tiger Tim at Rhosesmor but they wanted to make it bigger. The villagers felt that this would spoil the village, especially because it was near some old people's bungalows. The council were supporting the extension of the factory. There was a public meeting in the village hall and after a lot of discussion and debating the people of Rhosesmor won the day. There will be no extension now.
